document.full_text: french finance minister christine lagarde will likely become the next head of the international monetary fund (imf), with backing of the united states and japan, the nikkei financial daily reported on sunday, citing unidentified global financial industry sources in washington.
document.title: lagarde likely to be next imf chief: report
lines_and_colors: french finance minister christine lagarde will likely become the next head of the international monetary fund (imf), with backing of the united states and japan, the nikkei financial daily reported on sunday, citing unidentified global financial industry sources in washington.
